Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GuiUpdateHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GuiUpdateHandler
public class GuiUpdateHandler
extends UpdateHandler
This class handles all the updates from server to different clients. Every possible updates go to this class before it's viewable from users (in the GUI). BoardUpdate, DisconnectedPlayerUpdate, ErrorUpdate, GamePhaseUpdate, GodsUpdate, InitialInfoUpdate, LoseUpdate, MatchStartedUpdate, ServerUnreachableUpdate, TurnUpdate, WinUpdate are all managed in this class.

This class represent the Visitor in the Visitor Pattern, it implements UpdateHandler to have all the necessary methods to handle all possible updates.

See Also:
UpdateHandler

  • Field Details

    • guiInstance

      private final Gui guiInstance
      Instance of the Gui which this handler has to update

  • Constructor Details

    • GuiUpdateHandler

      GuiUpdateHandler​(Gui guiInstance, Controller controller)
      This is the creator of the class. At the moment of the instance creation an instance of Gui and Controller, to which the class refers, are set.
      Parameters:
      guiInstance - is the instance of Gui associated to the CliUpdateHandle for updates.
      controller - is the instance of the controller that is observed by the Gui.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle​(GamePhaseUpdate update)
      This method handles GamePhaseUpdate arrived from the Gui. Current game phase setter is invoked, and the correct method of Gui is called to start the new game phase and show the correct content to the user.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of GamePhaseUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.startInitialInfoPhase(), Gui.startGodChoicePhase(), Gui.startGamePreparation(), Gui.startRealGame(), Gui.onMatchFinished(GamePhase)

    • handle

      public void handle​(TurnUpdate update)
      This method handles TurnUpdate arrived from the Gui. The update is notified to the client side Controller to let it keep a reference to the current player in turn. Moreover, the Gui.onTurnChanged() callback is fired to update the UI.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of TurnUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.onTurnChanged()

    • handle

      public void handle​(InitialInfoUpdate update)
      This method handles InitialInfoUpdate arrived from the Gui. If initial info for all players have been chosen, this information is showed to the user. Otherwise, the Gui let the user choose its initial info.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of InitialInfoUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.setPlayersColors(Map), Gui.showInitialInfoOnTurn()

    • handle

      public void handle​(GodsUpdate update)
      This method handles GodsUpdate arrived from the Gui. If gods for all players have been chosen, this information is showed to the user. Otherwise, the Gui let the user choose its god.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of GodsUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.setPlayersGods(Map), Gui.showGodsChoiceOnTurn()

    • handle

      public void handle​(MatchStartedUpdate update)
      This method handles MatchStartedUpdate arrived from the Gui. Gui.onBoardChanged(String) callback is invoked, in order to update the user interface with the new Board associated with the update.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of MatchStartedUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.onBoardChanged(String)

    • handle

      public void handle​(BoardUpdate update)
      This method handles BoardUpdate arrived from the Gui. Gui.onBoardChanged(String) callback is invoked, in order to update the user interface with the new Board associated with the update.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of BoardUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.onBoardChanged(String)

    • handle

      public void handle​(ErrorUpdate update)
      This method handles ErrorUpdate arrived from the Gui. If the error was not caused by this player, nothing gets done. Otherwise, the Gui shows an error dialog to the user.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of ErrorUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.showError(ErrorUpdate)

    • handle

      public void handle​(WinUpdate update)
      This method handles WinUpdate arrived from the Gui. A win message dialog is shown to the user (the content will change depending on who actually won the match).
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of WinUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.showWinMessageDialog(WinUpdate)

    • handle

      public void handle​(LoseUpdate update)
      This method handles LoseUpdate arrived from the Gui. A lost message dialog is shown to the user (the content will change depending on how many players are still in game).
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of LoseUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.showLoseMessageDialog(LoseUpdate)

    • handle

      public void handle​(DisconnectedPlayerUpdate update)
      This method handles DisconnectedPlayerUpdate arrived from the Gui. if the game phase is not GamePhase.MATCH_ENDED an error dialog is shown to the user, which will decide to play another match or quit the game.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of DisconnectedPlayerUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.showDisconnectedPlayerDialog(DisconnectedPlayerUpdate)

    • handle

      public void handle​(ServerUnreachableUpdate update)
      This method handles ServerUnreachableUpdate arrived from the UpdateListener. An error dialog is shown to the user, and the game exits because communication with server it's not possible at the moment.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of ServerUnreachableUpdate from server.
      See Also:
      Gui.showServerUnreachableDialog()
